greet.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to say hello to someone or welcome them
greet.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Bill opened the door to Harold and greeted him with cries of welcome.
greet.translation[0].definitions[0].note: In everyday English, people usually use say hello (to somebody) rather than greet somebody:
greet.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to react to something in a particular way
greet.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His statement was greeted with cries of astonishment and indignation.
greet.translation[0].definitions[1].note: Greet is usually passive in this meaning
greet.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to be the first thing you see or hear when you arrive somewhere
greet.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Complete silence greeted us as we entered the room.
